original_text: And when the men of the city arose early in the morning, behold, the altar of Baal was cast down, and the grove was cut down that was by it, and the second bullock was offered upon the altar that was built.
korean_text: 그 성읍 사람들이 아침에 일찍이 일어나 본즉 바알의 제단이 파괴되었으며 그 곁의 아세라가 찍혔고 새로 쌓은 제단 위에 그 둘째 수소를 드렸는지라

sentences.original_text: And when the men of the city arose early in the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성읍 사람들이 아침 일찍 일어났을 때

sentences.original_text: behold, the altar of Baal was cast down
and the grove was cut down that was by it
and the second bullock was offered upon the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 수소가 제단 위에 드려졌다
